Codespace.Description: UK National Public Transport Access Nodes database and codes
UK National Public Transport gazetteer and NPTG codes. Codes of regions, administrative areas, and localities are unique within the UK.
UK National Public Transport SMS prefix codes. Codes are unique within the UK.
